about_the_game:
In common with all previous episodes, there are extra scenes, routes and stories available when the main game has been completed.

However, you may want to try all this bonus content without bothering to complete the game first - that is what this DLC is for: Allow full access to all the bits that would normally only be available through a standard gameplay.

When downloaded, a cheat option in the Options menu will be available. This will allow you to activate and deactivate cheat mode at will.

Extra scenes include :

  • 5 bonus stories
  • Choice during the Grendel Island section
  • Alternative story when Grendel and Braeden in an alleyway
